m_szDocTitle: Why Does Anyone Need to Own a Car? Google (GOOGL), Apple (AAPL) and Uber Are Asking - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Why Does Anyone Need to Own a Car? Google, Apple and Uber Are Asking By Doron Levin | 12/17/15 - 12:35 PM EST Reprint Alphabet's Google ( GOOGL - Get Report )  has shared very little with the public about its strategy to monetize its driverless car technology. Apple ( AAPL - Get Report )  and Uber have revealed even less. Yet hints are emerging throughout the automobile and software industries about a vision of vehicle-sharing that could one day dislocate or replace the current model of privately owned automobiles.  The advent of smartphones and the emergence of artificial intelligen
